author: gartung
body:
to also include the following additional member functions of modules

	streamBeginRun
	streamBeginLuminosityBlock
	streamEndRun
	streamEndLuminosityBlock

	globalBeginRun
	globalEndRun
	globalBeginLuminosityBlock
	globalEndLuminosityBlock

	endRun
	endLuminosityBlock
title: extend the static analysis for the 'modules to thread unsafe statics'
